text:
Biden’s big-gov't agenda will no doubt HURT everyday Americans.

His proposed STRICT regulations & HIGH taxes will squash our economy.

During Pres. Trump's 3 yrs in office, he has SLASHED regulations & CUT taxes—helping businesses grow & putting more money in Americans' pockets!
